name: idb-managed
description: Easy APIs for IndexedDB, with DB manager to manage local DBs. Based on idb.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc && cp -r src/lib/*.js build/lib/
scripts.demo: npm run build && rm -rf demo/js && webpack
scripts.allready: npm run test && npm run build && npm run demo
scripts.publish:beta: npm run allready && standard-version --prerelease beta && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.publish:prod: npm run allready && standard-version && git push --follow-tags origin master && npm publish

author: sylvia
